replies.bodyText:
The trouble is that the class Matcher takes a StringBuffer. And it seems those two types are incompatible.
Of course, I could just copy the code from the library and replace the string buffer by a string builder. It would increase the complexity of the PR, but not a lot. And actually, it would even do one nice thing: it would allow to use a single buffer, instead of creating a new buffer at each level of the recursion (i.e. for each {{#...}}...{{/...}} and each {{^...}}...{{/...}})
